turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Sordid Lives: The Series.
turn.1: What is Sordid Lives: The Series about?
turn.2: Sordid Lives: The Series Sordid Lives: The Series is an American television series created, written, and directed by Del Shores.
turn.3: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.4: It acts as a prequel to the 2000 film "Sordid Lives", also by Shores, self-described as a "black comedy about white trash".
turn.6: The show is set in small town Texas and centers on the Ingram family.
turn.8: It stars Rue McClanahan, Olivia Newton-John, Caroline Rhea, Leslie Jordan, Beth Grant and most of the original cast of the film.
turn.9: When did the series come out?
turn.10: It premiered on Logo in July 2008.
turn.12: In Canada, "Sordid Lives" the uncut version can be seen on Super Channel (also in HD) and the censored version on Out TV.
